original_text: Then I saw an angel who was coming down from heaven. He was holding the key to the deep hole. He also held a great chain in his hand.
korean_text: 또 내가 보매 천사가 무저갱의 열쇠와 큰 쇠사슬을 그의 손에 가지고 하늘로부터 내려와서

sentences.original_text: who was coming down from heaven
He was holding the key to the deep hole
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 깊은 구멍의 열쇠를 쥐고 있었고

sentences.original_text: He also held a great chain in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 손에 거대한 쇠사슬을 쥐고 있었다
